title: Purifier Vayne (skin idea)
body:
Hi! The tittle says it all... Vayne is now from the order of Lucian.
...Really inspired by cyberpunk stuff for this concept

[img]http://i.imgur.com/3GUiFqP.jpg[/img]

Feel free to comment!

replies.body: I love seeing decent-quality art of interesting champion skins on the forums! It's neat idea. They have champion crossover skins (see Soul Reaver Draven) and they usually turn out really cool. This one just sounds like it's bound to work.
